title: Oi GD, I got my new laptop a few days ago. Any recomendations as to what I should do?
body:
Like stuffs to install or things to optimise and whatnot. 
I just did whatever was in the "quickstart" booklet, so not much.
Plan to install malwarebytes next time I start it. Some antivirus came with the laptop. 'bout it.
'twas kinda wonky when I used it though. I'm not too sure how to describe it. I think the first time I tried to click on something, the screen turned a certain color and froze for a few seconds? A few other stuffs too that I forgot. That supposed to happen?

Bonus points for people that can explain me the "meltdown" and "spectre" bugs that were recently discovered and what/why/how it could potentially affect my laptop.
